cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.DM, cs.CG. 

The paper deals with the local correctability of codes, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). It also involves the study of codes with specific algebraic structures, which falls under the category of discrete structures (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the query complexity of the codes, which is a topic in computational complexity theory (cs.CC). Additionally, the paper involves combinatorial arguments and constructions, which are relevant to discrete mathematics (cs.DM) and computational geometry (cs.CG).
